title:
Jetclass | Product of the week
A whole new world everyday!

Her busy life, with constant comes and goes...

attachments.displayName:
Jetclass | Product of the week
A whole new world everyday!

Her busy life, with constant comes and goes in the different areas of the house, often makes her pass by Opium Bubbles Mirror. And it is never unnoticed.

To her and her visits, Bubbles Mirror is like a welcome card on the way in and the best goodbye look on the way out. In multiple faces, this mirror by Opium reveals to be a friendly advisor in the morning, a trustful opinion about the perfect look to have on that party, the multiple reflection of her reality. In each circle, a different dream comes up!

In front of this Opium piece by Jetclass, she feels ready to all the adventures of real life.

See our Bubbles Mirror here: http://ow.ly/qsEWr
